trans-unit.source: Ingredient Lot Selection

seg-source.mrk: Ingredient Lot Selection

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon of the Ingredient Lot Overview page, click Select Component Lots to open the Ingredient Lot - Select page for lot selection and ingredient surveillance.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Ingredient Lot Overview page, click Select Component Lots to open the Ingredient Lot - Select page for lot selection and ingredient surveillance.

trans-unit.source: : Ingredient Lot - Select page for the P-60018 component line on the Ingredient Lot Overview

seg-source.mrk: : Ingredient Lot - Select page for the P-60018 component line on the Ingredient Lot Overview

trans-unit.source: The Ingredient Lot - Select page shows the outstanding quantity from the Prod. Order Component; reserved and requested quantities from the component and other documents; and the captured quantity from existing Item Tracking, as well as calculates the Undefined Qty. and the assumed resulting Prod. Order Component Ingredients.

seg-source.mrk: The Ingredient Lot - Select page shows the outstanding quantity from the Prod.
Order Component; reserved and requested quantities from the component and other documents; and the captured quantity from existing Item Tracking, as well as calculates the Undefined Qty.
and the assumed resulting Prod.
Order Component Ingredients.

trans-unit.source: The fields in the Filters section are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the Filters section are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Item No.

seg-source.mrk: Item No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the item number of the component.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the item number of the component.

trans-unit.source: Variant Code

seg-source.mrk: Variant Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates the variant of the component, if used.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the variant of the component, if used.

trans-unit.source: Sum Outstanding

seg-source.mrk: Sum Outstanding

trans-unit.source: Displays the Remaining Quantity from the component.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Remaining Quantity from the component.

trans-unit.source: Sum Selected Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Sum Selected Quantity

trans-unit.source: Displays the sum of Qty. to Handle (Base) from the component Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the sum of Qty.
to Handle (Base) from the component Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: Sum Undefined Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Sum Undefined Quantity

trans-unit.source: Displays the calculation of Sum Outstanding Quantity – Sum Selected Quantity.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the calculation of Sum Outstanding Quantity – Sum Selected Quantity.

trans-unit.source: Unit of Measure Code

seg-source.mrk: Unit of Measure Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates the unit of measure code from the Prod. Order Component.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the unit of measure code from the Prod.
Order Component.

trans-unit.source: The Sum Selected Quantity and Sum Undefined Quantity fields are calculated using this Unit of Measure. Lot inventory is shown in Base Unit of Measure.

seg-source.mrk: The Sum Selected Quantity and Sum Undefined Quantity fields are calculated using this Unit of Measure.
Lot inventory is shown in Base Unit of Measure.

trans-unit.source: The fields in the General section contain information for each lot with inventory. Each is described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields in the General section contain information for each lot with inventory.
Each is described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Lot No.

seg-source.mrk: Lot No.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the lot number available for selection.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the lot number available for selection.

trans-unit.source: Item Description

seg-source.mrk: Item Description

trans-unit.source: Indicates the description of the component item.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the description of the component item.

trans-unit.source: Selected Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Selected Quantity

trans-unit.source: Editable field, used to select the number of units of this lot to assign to the component.

seg-source.mrk: Editable field, used to select the number of units of this lot to assign to the component.

trans-unit.source: Status

seg-source.mrk: Status

trans-unit.source: Indicates the lot status from the cc|quality management functionality (refer to topic “cc|quality management” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the lot status from the cc|quality management functionality (refer to topic “cc|quality management” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Expiration Date

seg-source.mrk: Expiration Date

trans-unit.source: Indicates the lot expiration date from the Item Tracking Entries.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the lot expiration date from the Item Tracking Entries.

trans-unit.source: Total Available Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Total Available Quantity

trans-unit.source: Displays the total available quantity for the lot, filtered by the location code of the component.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the total available quantity for the lot, filtered by the location code of the component.

trans-unit.source: Current Reserved Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Current Reserved Quantity

trans-unit.source: Displays the lot quantity that has been reserved for the selected component in the current production order.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the lot quantity that has been reserved for the selected component in the current production order.

trans-unit.source: Total Reserved Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Total Reserved Quantity

trans-unit.source: Displays the total lot quantity that has been reserved for the selected component in the current production order and in other documents or entries.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the total lot quantity that has been reserved for the selected component in the current production order and in other documents or entries.

trans-unit.source: Total Requested Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Total Requested Quantity

trans-unit.source: Displays the total quantity of the lot number that is currently requested in all documents.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the total quantity of the lot number that is currently requested in all documents.

trans-unit.source: Current Pending Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Current Pending Quantity

trans-unit.source: Displays the quantity that is entered in the current instance of the Ingredient Lot - Select page but is not yet committed to the database.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the quantity that is entered in the current instance of the Ingredient Lot - Select page but is not yet committed to the database.

trans-unit.source: Unit of Measure Code

seg-source.mrk: Unit of Measure Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates the base unit of measure of the component item.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the base unit of measure of the component item.

trans-unit.source: Ingredient UOM

seg-source.mrk: Ingredient UOM

trans-unit.source: Indicates the unit of measure of the ingredient.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the unit of measure of the ingredient.

trans-unit.source: Ingredient 1 .. Ingredient 8

seg-source.mrk: Ingredient 1 .. Ingredient 8

trans-unit.source: Displays the summed expected or actual (measured) ingredients assigned automatically or manually in the Lot No. Ingredients page. The summed quantity is calculated (based on the available quantity) from the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Displays the summed expected or actual (measured) ingredients assigned automatically or manually in the <span class="Bold">Lot No.
Ingredients page.
The summed quantity is calculated (based on the available quantity) from the following values:

trans-unit.source: If the lot ingredient has not been measured, then the value from the Quantity (Expected) field is used.

seg-source.mrk: If the lot ingredient has not been measured, then the value from the Quantity (Expected) field is used.

trans-unit.source: If the lot ingredient has been measured and the Actual Value check box is selected, then the value from the Quantity (Actual) field is used.

seg-source.mrk: If the lot ingredient has been measured and the Actual Value check box is selected, then the value from the Quantity (Actual) field is used.

trans-unit.source: Up to eight ingredients can be displayed in this page.

seg-source.mrk: Up to eight ingredients can be displayed in this page.

trans-unit.source: The Ingredients FastTab displays the Production Order Component Ingredients, with all resulting values regarding Expected, Captured and Posted Ingredient Quantities (Ratio / Total) from updating the Item Tracking.

seg-source.mrk: The Ingredients FastTab displays the Production Order Component Ingredients, with all resulting values regarding Expected, Captured and Posted Ingredient Quantities (Ratio / Total) from updating the Item Tracking.

trans-unit.source: The Home tab also includes the Lot No. Information Card and Lot No. Information Card Adv. actions. On the General FastTab of these pages, the Update Prod. Order Ingredients check box indicates if an ingredient of the lot has changed, and therefore it might be necessary to recalculate the production order ingredients.

seg-source.mrk: The Home tab also includes the Lot No.
Information Card and Lot No.
Information Card Adv.
actions.
On the General FastTab of these pages, the Update Prod.
Order Ingredients check box indicates if an ingredient of the lot has changed, and therefore it might be necessary to recalculate the production order ingredients.

trans-unit.source: Procedure – Select Lots for a Production Order Component

seg-source.mrk: Procedure – Select Lots for a Production Order Component

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to select lots for a Prod. Order Component based on their ingredients:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to select lots for a Prod.
Order Component based on their ingredients:

trans-unit.source: On the Ingredient Lot Overview page, select the Component line for which to change the Item Tracking or one of the related lines below and then click Select Component Lots.

seg-source.mrk: On the Ingredient Lot Overview page, select the Component line for which to change the Item Tracking or one of the related lines below and then click Select Component Lots.

trans-unit.source: In the General section, in the Selected Quantity field, type the Quantity (Base) to appear in the Item Tracking Lines from the specific lot.

seg-source.mrk: In the General section, in the Selected Quantity field, type the Quantity (Base) to appear in the Item Tracking Lines from the specific lot.

trans-unit.source: : Ingredient Lot - Select page for the P-60018 component line with selected lot quantity

seg-source.mrk: : Ingredient Lot - Select page for the P-60018 component line with selected lot quantity

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the page and update the Item Tracking Lines (Reservation Entries).

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the page and update the Item Tracking Lines (Reservation Entries).

trans-unit.source: The Ingredient Lot Overview page is updated based on the new Item Tracking information.

seg-source.mrk: The Ingredient Lot Overview page is updated based on the new Item Tracking information.

trans-unit.source: : Ingredient Lot Overview page updated after lot selected for the P-60018 component line

seg-source.mrk: : Ingredient Lot Overview page updated after lot selected for the P-60018 component line
